item.title: Almost SC*-normal spaces
item.description: arXiv:2506.14284v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: This paper introduces and investigates a new class of almost normal spaces, referred to as almost SC*-normal spaces, which are defined using SC*-open sets. Building on the work of A. Chandrakala and K. Bala Deepa Arasi, we explore several properties of these spaces within the framework of topology. Moreover, we obtain some new characterizations and preservation theorems of almost SC*-normal spaces.
item.dc:creator: Neeraj Kumar Tomar, Fahed Zulfeqarr, Amit Ujlayan
